name: Willy Wrench - Repair guy
description:
NOTE!
Once you click Run, the game will launch in fullscreen.

I did not manage to implement attack to kill the snowmen, so our Multi-use is not really there. Best of luck turning on all 8 furnaces, as we did not manage to test the final functionality.

Snowballs fire each 5 seconds, did not manage to make a visual que for it.
One hit and you die, as life system is also missing.

Also you cannot climb back down ladders, did not implement that.
